items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a flat start; US, Asian markets mixed
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: US stocks ended little changed on Tuesday, but the Nasdaq eked out a modest gain while investors kept an eye on Treasuries yields and awaited more earnings to assess the health of American companies. In a choppy session, the Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 6.71 points, or 0.02%, to 42,924.89, the S&P 500 lost 2.78 points, or 0.05%, to 5,851.20 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 33.12 points, or 0.18%, to 18,573.13.

items.title: Live: Nifty down 7% from highs, more pain ahead? | Bajaj Finance, Zomato in focus | Opening Bell
items.description: In the blink of an eyeâ€”well, a month, to be preciseâ€”the Nifty 50, which once basked in the glory of a record high at 26,277, has taken a bit of a nosedive, corrected nearly 7 percent and dropping almost 2,000 points. Monday brought a wild rollercoaster of volatility, but Tuesday was like a one-way ticket down for the Nifty, with crucial support levels crumbling and every little bounce getting smacked down. Looking ahead, experts are buzzing that if the Nifty tumbles below the 24,000 mark, we could be in for a wild ride down to around 23,800. This morning global cues are mixed. Wall Street closed mixed overnight, while Asian markets are off to a quiet start. Among stocks in focus, watch out for Bajaj Finance, Zomato, Hindustan Unilever among others. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Rajesh Palviya, Senior Vice President Research (Head Technical & Derivatives ), Axis Securities.

items.title: Celebrations at NSE as Moneycontrol Pro crosses one million paying subscribers
items.description:
Moneycontrol Pro, a subscription product from Network18's Moneycontrol, has crossed 1 million paying subscribers, cementing its position as India's largest news subscription platform and emerging among the top 15 worldwide. Moneycontrol Pro's paying subscription numbers are now close to major international media platforms such as Financial Times and Barrons.
This milestone highlights Moneycontrol Pro's reputation and track record as a trusted source of financial intelligence for investors seeking in-depth insights in India's capital markets.
Catch a special celebration at NSE to make this huge milestone followed by a scintillating panel discussion with market mavens

items.title: RITES stock edges higher on securing Rs 454-crore turnkey contract in Karnataka
items.description: Shares of RITES surged on October 23 after the company's PMC contract with KMERC was converted into a Rs 454 crore turnkey project, boosting investor sentiment.

items.title: Moneycontrol Pro Surpasses 1mn Paid Subscribers, Hailed by Users for Exceptional Value & Insights
items.description: Moneycontrol Pro, India's leading digital financial platform, has achieved a remarkable milestone by surpassing 1 million paid subscribers, a feat unprecedented in the country's history. Industry leaders and subscribers alike have lauded this accomplishment as a testament to the platform's commitment to providing exceptional research, analysis, and user experience. Many subscribers reported a significant growth in their investments and trading activities, crediting the research-based stories for enhancing their understanding of the economy and recognising it as excellent value for money. They described Moneycontrol Pro as a comprehensive solution for understanding finance and the economy. To celebrate this achievement, Moneycontrol Pro hosted a bell-ringing ceremony at the National Stock Exchange, led by Network18 Managing Director and Group Editor-in-Chief Rahul Joshi, alongside the exchangeâ€™s Chief Executive Officer, Ashishkumar Chauhan.
